Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.example.hellojavafx.models.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Player extends Object implements Runnable
Represents a player in the game.

    • canPlayCard

      public boolean canPlayCard(int currentSum, Card card)
      Checks if the player can play the specified card.
      Parameters:
      currentSum - the current sum of card values
      card - the card to check
      Returns:
      true if the player can play the card, false otherwise
